description: Core API client for accessing Kalshi prediction market data
features: Public market data access (no authentication required)
Series, markets, events, and orderbook endpoints

get_fed_rate_probabilities.description: Get Federal Reserve rate decision probabilities

get_market_probability.description: Get probability for specific market ticker

usage_example:
from SCRIPTS.strategy_components.sentiment import KalshiAPI

kalshi = KalshiAPI()
fed_probs = kalshi.get_fed_rate_probabilities()
vix_probs = kalshi.get_vix_range_probabilities()
prob = kalshi.get_market_probability('FED-23DEC-T5.00')
